each adult singaporean can redeem up to six child/youth subsidies (that's a $10 discount per child/youth ticket) for family members aged below 18. 

how to redeem the vouchers online? tip: have your singpass details ready.

step 2: select the experiences and dates you wish to book and add to cart. when youâ€™re ready to pay, click on â€˜use singaporediscovers vouchersâ€™ at checkout. 

step 3: log in with singpass...

Post Description:
part of the singapore tourism boardâ€™s singaporediscovers campaign.

an eclectic mix of local guided tours and workshops in december will offer a behind-the-scenes look at geylang's red light district and migrant worker dormitories, singpost's mail distribution centre and the kelongs off changi point, in the inaugural my community festival.

other programmes include tours around toa payohâ€™s funeral parlours, where an undertaker will show participants how bodies are prepared for funerals, and visits to traditional craftsmen including tay guan heng, who is believed to be singaporeâ€™s last joss stick maker.

the festival is being organised by my community, a non-profit organisation that promotes community heritage by managing community museums and holding neighbourhood tours and festivals.

more details, when you click on the link in bio @todayonline 

photos: @mycommunitysg; singpost

@singapore @visit_singapore @stb_sg #singaporediscovers

Post Description:
singapoliday time! 

each singaporean aged 18 and above (as of 2020) will get $100 in singaporediscovers vouchers that can be used for attraction tickets, hotel stays and local tours in singapore from dec 1, 2020 to june 30, 2021. these will be distributed in denominations of $10.

there are five authorised online platforms to redeem the vouchers: changi recommends, trip.com, klook, globaltix, and traveloka. you will need to use your singpass account to claim your vouchers.

for those who are unable to redeem their vouchers digitally, there will be physical touchpoints set up by booking platforms. stb is also working with the peopleâ€™s association to set up physical booths at some community centres (ccs).

where can you use your singaporediscovers vouchers?
there are over 200 merchants where you can use those singaporediscover vouchers â€” 37 attractions, 164 hotels and 79 tour operators are on the list at press time.

for the full (and very handy) list of the attractions, hotels and local tours you can use your singaporediscovers vouchers at, click on the link in bio @todayonline 

photo: unsplash 

#singapore #singaporediscovers #voucher #supportllocal #supportlocalsg
Comments: I was so excited when I saw payment of $5000, what a boost! Exactly what I needed right now, thank you so much for the successful payment @official_consultantbrianna

Post Description:
forget about that overseas vacation (for now).

it's time to holiday in singapore, with some help from singaporediscovers vouchers. 

every singaporean aged 18 and over will get s$100 worth of tourism vouchers to spend locally on staycations, attraction tickets and tours. 

how will you receive it? no queueing necessary. you can access the vouchers via your singpass account - more details are set to be released in november.

when are the vouchers valid from and until? december 2020 to end-june 2021. 
yes, just in time for the school holidays this december, next march and even next june, so there's no need to rush to use your tourism credits.

what about those under 18? those above 18 can buy children and youth tickets for attractions and tours at a s$10 subsidy. each adult is allowed to purchase up to six of such tickets.

more q / a, in the link in bio @todayonline 

photo: unsplash
Comments: @izz_okie  can we go uss tgt hahahah
